title: Steph Curry's 2016 season was UNFAIR (by the numbers)

hook.text:
Steph Curry's 2016 season wasn't just good. It was mathematically ILLEGAL.

[On-screen: "73-9 + UNANIMOUS MVP 🐐"]

Here's the stat that proves it...

explanation.text:
40.27 PVR. For context:
- League average: ~15 PVR
- All-Stars: 20-30 PVR
- MVPs: 30-40 PVR
- Curry: 40.27 PVR

[Show graphic with tiers]

He scored 30.1 PPG on absurd efficiency WHILE creating for teammates. Every possession was productive.

And his TUSG%? Only 36.87%. He wasn't even dominating the ball like Westbrook.

example.text:
Translation: Lower usage than Harden, higher efficiency than anyone.

[Show: 402 threes + 67 wins + 40.27 PVR = UNSTOPPABLE]

That's why it's the greatest offensive season ever. Pure math dominance.

cta.text:
Follow for more stats that prove what your eyes see. Link in bio for all-time PVR leaders.

[End screen: "CURRY '16 = BROKEN 🎯"]

Keep energy high - fast cuts, dynamic visuals
